techmeme.title: Perplexity is launching a program to share ad revenue with partners such as Time, Der Spiegel, Fortune, and WordPress.com, after weeks of plagiarism accusations (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
The UK ICO says the country's election authority failed to take "basic steps" to protect the personal data of 40M people before a 2021 China-backed cyberattack (Rafe Uddin/Financial Times)
The UK CMA is gathering information from market players to determine whether Google's partnership with Anthropic qualifies as a merger and harms competition (Katharine Gemmell/Bloomberg)
PayPal reports Q2 revenue up 8% YoY to $7.89B, total payment volume up 11% to $416.81B, transaction margin dollars up 8%, and raises its FY 2024 profit forecast (Manya Saini/Reuters)
Experts say AI forecasting models are predicting weather patterns with new speed and precision and are likely to complement supercomputer forecasting models (William J. Broad/New York Times)
